textBox.richText: I want to describe everything around this project a bit. I’m currently the only developer of this project, I’m a student and I really don’t have very much free time. This means that the development on Netwars is slow. Very slow. Also, building Netwars for Windows is not so trivial, and I don’t want to do this process every day. So the Windows version lags behind the Mac version, which is easy to build.
